     Problem Solution
    Season 1 > TCHS Single Round Match 32 > Round 1 > Room 6 >


    Problem Solutions
      Class Name Method Name Difficulty Status Points
    BoulderRace winner Level One Passed System Test 242.69
    SpecialDay howMany Level Two Passed System Test 459.81
    SuperPasture whichOne Level Three Passed System Test 699.97


    view problem statement
    ahyangyi's solution to SpecialDay 

        #include <string>

using namespace std;

class SpecialDay {
  public:
  
  int howMany(string weekday, int which, string month, int day) {
    int we,mo;
    int yy,mm,dd,md,wd,re;
    
    re = 0;
    if (weekday == "SUNDAY")
      we = 0;
    if (weekday == "MONDAY")
      we = 1;
    if (weekday == "TUESDAY")
      we = 2;
    if (weekday == "WEDNESDAY")
      we = 3;
    if (weekday == "THURSDAY")
      we = 4;
    if (weekday == "FRIDAY")
      we = 5;
    if (weekday == "SATURDAY")
      we = 6;
    if (month == "JANUARY")
      mo = 1;
    if (month == "FEBRUARY")
      mo = 2;
    if (month == "MARCH")
      mo = 3;
    if (month == "APRIL")
      mo = 4;
    if (month == "MAY")
      mo = 5;
    if (month == "JUNE")
      mo = 6;
    if (month == "JULY")
      mo = 7;
    if (month == "AUGUST")
      mo = 8;
    if (month == "SEPTEMBER")
      mo = 9;
    if (month == "OCTOBER")
      mo = 10;
    if (month == "NOVEMBER")
      mo = 11;
    if (month == "DECEMBER")
      mo = 12;
    wd = 5;
    for (yy = 2000; yy <= 2100; yy ++) {
      int count = 0;
      for (mm = 1; mm <= 12; mm ++) {
        switch (mm) {
          case 1:case 3:case 5:case 7:case 8:case 10:case 12:
            md = 31;
            break;
          case 4:case 6:case 9:case 11:
            md = 30;
            break;
          case 2:
            md = 28 + (yy % 4 == 0 && (yy % 100 != 0 || yy % 400 == 0));
          };
        for (dd = 1; dd <= md; dd ++) {
          wd = (wd + 1) % 7;
          if (mm == mo && wd == we) {
            count ++;
            if (count == which && dd == day)
              re ++;
            }
          }
        }
      }
    return re;
    }
  };

    System Test Results
